name: Microwave Cacio e Pepe with Peas, Salad, and Garlic Baguette
description: Heat-and-eat cacio e pepe bowls with quick-microwaved peas, a ready salad, and warm garlic baguette. Zero chili heat and table-ready in minutes.
prep_steps: Place the cacio e pepe trays on the counter and pierce film if required.
Add peas to a microwave-safe bowl with 2–3 tablespoons water.
If the garlic baguette is whole, cut into 8–10 slices.
Add salad to a large bowl and set salad dressing nearby.
cook_steps: Microwave the cacio e pepe per pack directions until hot, stirring once midway.
Microwave the peas on High for 3–4 minutes until tender; drain any water.
Microwave the garlic baguette slices for 60–90 seconds until warm (or follow pack).
Drizzle salad dressing over the salad and toss.
Plate cacio e pepe, add a scoop of peas, and serve with salad and warm garlic baguette.

ingredients.preparation: microwave-safe bowl with a splash of water
